hi everyone..how you all doing: just got a quick question..I'm trying to do a clean install of ubuntu, and this time I will format the harddisk, but I want it a clean format, because I still see the grub from a previous installation..is there a way to do that using ubuntu's live CD?
grub isnt' part of a partition, it's part of the "Master Boot Record".
you don't need to clean it out, just re-install grub over it
